Definition: The input is a tweet. The tweet can be classified as Hate Speech, Offensive, or Normal. If the tweet contains threatening language towards the community targeted, it is classified as Hate Speech. If the tweet contains abusive or discriminatory language towards the community targeted, it is classified as Offensive. Otherwise, it is classified as Normal.
